|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM6755; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF2G18AC-TI; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16ER-EK; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = F4:6D:04 |oui = F4:6D:04
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, WPA3, 1024QAM, MU-MIMO, OFDMA, VHT80, HEW80, AiMesh, AiProtection, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/20/2020 |estreldate = 05/2020 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 1201 |rad2ac = 876 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *'''ASUS ZenWiFi AX Mini (XD4)''' • AX1800 Dual Band Mesh WiFi 6 System :*[[ASUS ZenWiFi AX Mini (XD4R)]] • AX1800 Dual Band Mesh WiFi 6 Router :*[[ASUS ZenWiFi AX Mini (XD4N)]] • AX1800 Dual Band Mesh WiFi 6 Node
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://dongknows.com/asus-zenwifi-ax-mini-xd4-review/ ''ASUS ZenWiFi AX Mini (XD4)'' on '''Dongknows'''] *[https://www.acwifi.net/11406.html ''ASUS ZenWiFi AX Mini (XD4)'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] *[https://www.noticiasdeinformatica.net/router-asus-rt-ax56u-ax1800/ ''ASUS RT-AX56U Wi-Fi 6 Router'' Review on '''NDI'''] (ES)
===Models=== :;[[ASUS ZenWiFi series]] • [[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] *[[ASUS ZenWiFi AC (CT8)]] (AC3000) • [[ASUS RT-AC95U]] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/ZenWiFi-AC-CT8/ PPage] *[[ASUS ZenWiFi AX (XT8)]] (AX6600) • [[ASUS RT-AX95Q]] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/ZenWiFi-AX-XT8/ PPage] *[[ASUS ZenWiFi AX Mini (XD4R)]] (AX1800) • ''AX1800 Dual Band WiFi Router'' • [https://24wireless.info/asus-zenwifi-ax-mini-xd4 24|W] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTAXJE00 MSQ-RTAXJE00] (2020-04-13) • 12V/1.5A, 1x WAN, 1x LAN, BT • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/ASUS-ZenWiFi-AX-Mini-XD4/ PPage] *[[ASUS ZenWiFi AX Mini (XD4N)]] (AX1800) • ''AX1800 Dual Band WiFi Node'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTAXJE01 MSQ-RTAXJE01] (2020-04-20) • 12V/1.5A, 1x LAN • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/ASUS-ZenWiFi-AX-Mini-XD4/ PPage]
==See also== :;[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[ASUS GT-AXE11000]] • AXE11000 Tri-band Gaming Gigabit Router :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAXJF00 (2020-08-04) 19V/3.33A *[[ASUS RT-AX3000]] • [[ASUS TUF-AX3000]] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/TUF-Gaming-AX3000/ PPage] :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAXJ300 (2020-06-17) • (HND-963178_BASE)/96750GW *[[ASUS RT-AX1800]] (AX1800) • AX1800 Dual Band WiFi 6 Router • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AX1800/ PPage] *[[ASUS RT-AX55]] (AX1800) • AX1800 Dual Band WiFi 6 Router • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AX55/ PPage] :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAX8A00 (2020-08-06) *[[ASUS RT-AX56U]] (AX1800) • (HND-947622_BASE)/BCM53134 • [https://www.noticiasdeinformatica.net/router-asus-rt-ax56u-ax1800/ Review] :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAXHY00 (2019-08-27) *[[ASUS RP-AX56]] (AX1800) • Dual-Band Wireless Repeater :FCC ID: MSQ-RPAX4W00 (2020-08-11) *[[ASUS RT-AX58U]] (AX3000) • (HND-963178_BASE)/96750GW • [https://www.noticiasdeinformatica.net/router-asus-rt-ax58u-ax3000/ Review] :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAXJ300 (2020-06-17) *[[ASUS RT-AX68U]] (AX6000) • (HND-962118_BASE) :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAXIA00 (2020-08-05) 19V/1.75A *[[ASUS RT-AX82U]] (AX5400) • (HND-963178_BASE)/96750GW :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAXJ300 (2020-06-17) *[[ASUS DSL-AX82U]] (AX5400) • BCM63178/96750GW (VDSL2) *[[ASUS RT-AX86U]] (AX5700) • (HND-962118_BASE)/BCM84880 :FCC ID: MSQ-RTAXI600 (2020-02-12) *[[ASUS RT-AX88U]] (AX6000) • (HND-94908_BASE)/BCM53134 *[[ASUS RT-AX89X]] (AX6000) • (IPQ8078/QCA8337/AR8033) *[[ASUS RT-AX92U]] (AX6100) • (HND-94908_BASE) *[[ASUS RT-AX95U]] (AX11000) • (HND-94908_BASE)/BCM84880 :FCC ID: MSQ-RTHR00 (2020-03-05) • [[ASUS GT-AX11000]] *[[ASUS RT-AX95Q]] (AX6600) • [[ASUS ZenWiFi AX (XT8)|ZenWiFi XT8]] • (HND-947622_BASE)/BCM53134 *[[ASUS RT-AC95U]] (AC3000) • [[ASUS ZenWiFi AC (CT8)|ZenWiFi CT8]] • (IPQ4019/QCA9884/QCA8072)
*[[ASUS RT-AC68U V3]] (AC1900) • FCC ID: MSQ-RTACIB00 (2020-06-10) *[[ASUS RP-AC4200]] • Wi-Fi AC Repeater • FCC ID: MSQ-RPAC4200 (2020-04-09) *[[ASUS RT-AC5300]] • [[ASUS GT-AC5300]] • FCC ID: MSQ-RTGZ00 (2020-02-27)
